content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
- Furnace at position (63.0, -52.0)
- Furnace at position (65.0, -52.0)

### Copper ore mine
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.5, -61.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inventory management
- Ensure that you are aware of the inventory changes after each operation to avoid confusion about available resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to harvesting
- Confirm the position of the resource before attempting to harvest to avoid unnecessary movement.
